info.name: MBankingCore Admin API
info.description:
🔧 **ADMIN-ONLY API Collection** for MBankingCore running on PORT 8080

## 🎯 Admin Features Coverage:
- ✅ Admin Authentication (Login/Logout)
- ✅ Admin Dashboard with comprehensive statistics
- ✅ Admin CRUD Management
- ✅ Transaction Monitoring & Management
- ✅ Transaction Reversal Operations
- ✅ **Checker-Maker System** (Dual Approval Workflow) 🆕
- ✅ **Approval Threshold Management** 🆕
- ✅ Configuration Management
- ✅ Admin Content Management (Terms & Privacy Policy)
- ✅ Audit Trails & Security Monitoring
- ✅ User Management (Admin view)
- ✅ Admin User Balance Top-up
- ✅ **Soft Delete System** (Users & Admins) 🆕

## 📊 Admin Dashboard Statistics:
- 👥 Total Users: 6,067+
- 👨‍💼 Total Admins: 50+
- 💳 Total Transactions: 35,375+
- 💰 Transaction Analytics by time periods
- 📈 Performance metrics and trends

## 🔐 Admin Authentication Flow:
1. **Admin Login** → Submit admin credentials and get admin access_token
2. **Get Dashboard** → View comprehensive system statistics
3. **Access Admin Endpoints** → Full admin operations
4. **Admin Logout** → Invalidate admin session

## 🛠️ Admin Management Operations:
- **Get All Admins** → List all administrators with pagination
- **Get Admin by ID** → Retrieve specific admin details
- **Create Admin** → Add new administrator account
- **Update Admin** → Modify admin account details
- **Delete Admin** → Remove administrator account

## 💳 Transaction Management:
- **Get All Transactions** → Monitor all user transactions with filtering
- **Reverse Transaction** → Reverse any transaction type with reason
- **Admin Topup User Balance** → Admin can top-up user balance directly
- **Admin Adjust User Balance** → Credit/debit adjustments with reason tracking
- **Admin Set User Balance** → Set exact balance amount with audit trail
- **Get User Balance History** → View detailed balance change history
- **Transaction Analytics** → View transaction trends and statistics

## ⚖️ Checker-Maker System (Dual Approval) 🆕:
- **Create Pending Transaction (Maker)** → Submit high-value transactions for approval
  - Supports: topup, withdraw, transfer, balance_adjustment, balance_set
  - Automatic threshold validation based on transaction type and amount
  - Segregation of duties: Maker cannot approve own transactions
- **Get Pending Transactions** → View all transactions awaiting approval
  - Filter by status (pending, approved, rejected, expired)
  - Filter by transaction type, maker admin, target user
  - Pagination support for large datasets
- **Approve Transaction (Checker)** → Approve pending transactions
  - Validates checker is different from maker
  - Automatically executes approved transaction
  - Creates audit trail for approval decision
- **Reject Transaction (Checker)** → Reject pending transactions
  - Requires rejection reason/comments
  - Prevents transaction execution
  - Maintains audit trail for compliance
- **Get Approval Statistics** → View approval system metrics
  - Statistics by transaction type, admin, time period
  - Approval rates, rejection rates, expiration tracking
  - Performance analytics for compliance reporting

## 🎯 Approval Threshold Management 🆕:
- **Get All Approval Thresholds** → List all approval thresholds
- **Get Approval Threshold by Type** → Get threshold for specific transaction type
- **Create/Update Approval Threshold** → Configure approval rules
  - Set amount thresholds requiring approval
  - Configure dual approval thresholds for ultra-high values
  - Set auto-expiration timeouts
  - Activate/deactivate thresholds
- **Deactivate Approval Threshold** → Disable threshold rules

## 🛡️ Security & Compliance Features:
- **Segregation of Duties** → Maker-checker separation enforced
- **Configurable Thresholds** → Based on transaction type and amount
- **Auto-Expiration** → Prevents stale approvals (12-48 hours)
- **Dual Approval** → Ultra-high value transactions require two approvals
- **Comprehensive Audit Trail** → All approval actions logged
- **Risk-Based Controls** → Different thresholds for different risk levels

## 👥 User Management (Admin Only):
- **Get All Users** → List all users with advanced search and filtering
- **Get User by ID** → Retrieve specific user details
- **Admin User Balance Management** → Comprehensive balance operations
  - **Topup** → Add funds to user balance
  - **Adjust** → Credit/debit with reason (positive/negative amounts)
  - **Set Balance** → Set exact balance amount
  - **Balance History** → View all balance-affecting transactions

## ⚙️ Configuration Management:
- **Get All Configs** → List all system configuration values
- **Get Config by Key** → Retrieve specific configuration value
- **Set Config** → Create or update configuration values
- **Delete Config** → Remove configuration values
- **Admin Terms & Conditions** → Manage admin-specific terms and conditions
- **Admin Privacy Policy** → Manage admin-specific privacy policy

## 🔍 Audit & Security Monitoring:
- **Get Audit Logs** → Review all system activities with filtering
  - Filter by entity type (user, transaction, admin, etc.)
  - Filter by action (CREATE, READ, UPDATE, DELETE)
  - Filter by user/admin ID, date range, IP address
  - Pagination support for large datasets
- **Get Login Audit Logs** → Monitor authentication activities
  - Filter by login type (user_login, admin_login, logout)
  - Filter by status (success, failed, blocked)
  - Device information and failure reasons

## 🚨 Security Features:
- JWT Token-based authentication
- Role-based access control
- Comprehensive audit trails
- Failed login monitoring
- IP address tracking
- Device session management
- **Checker-Maker Approval Controls** 🆕
- **Configurable Risk Thresholds** 🆕

## ⚠️ Important Notes:
- **Admin Token Required** → All endpoints require admin authentication
- **Role Permissions** → Different admin roles may have different permissions
- **Audit Compliance** → All admin actions are logged for security
- **Rate Limiting** → Admin actions may be rate-limited for security
- **Dual Approval** → High-value transactions require checker approval 🆕

## 🔧 Environment Variables Required:
- `base_url` → Server base URL (http://localhost:8080)
- `admin_email` → Admin email for login
- `admin_password` → Admin password for login
- `admin_token` → Admin access token (auto-set after login)
- `admin_id` → Admin ID (auto-set after login)
- `admin_role` → Admin role (auto-set after login)
- `config_key` → Configuration key for config operations
- `config_value` → Configuration value for config operations
- `admin_terms_content` → Admin terms & conditions content
- `admin_privacy_content` → Admin privacy policy content
- `target_user_id` → User ID for admin operations (topup, etc.)
- `topup_amount` → Amount to topup user balance
- `topup_description` → Description for topup transaction
- `adjustment_amount` → Amount for balance adjustment (positive for credit, negative for debit)
- `adjustment_reason` → Reason for balance adjustment (minimum 10 characters)
- `adjustment_type` → Type of adjustment (adjustment, correction, manual_correction, error_correction)
- `adjustment_description` → Optional description for adjustment
- `set_balance_amount` → Target balance amount for set balance operation
- `set_balance_reason` → Reason for setting balance (minimum 10 characters)
- `set_balance_description` → Optional description for set balance operation
- `balance_history_page` → Page number for balance history pagination
- `balance_history_limit` → Items per page for balance history
- `balance_history_type` → Filter balance history by transaction type
- `pending_transaction_id` → ID of pending transaction for approval/rejection 🆕
- `checker_maker_transaction_type` → Type: topup, withdraw, transfer, balance_adjustment, balance_set 🆕
- `checker_maker_amount` → Transaction amount for checker-maker 🆕
- `checker_maker_description` → Description for checker-maker transaction 🆕
- `checker_maker_target_user_id` → Target user ID for checker-maker transaction 🆕
- `approval_comments` → Comments for approval decision 🆕
- `rejection_comments` → Comments for rejection decision 🆕
- `threshold_transaction_type` → Transaction type for threshold management 🆕
- `threshold_amount` → Amount threshold for approval requirement 🆕
- `threshold_requires_dual` → Boolean for dual approval requirement 🆕
- `threshold_dual_amount` → Amount threshold for dual approval 🆕
- `threshold_expire_hours` → Hours until pending transaction expires 🆕
- `target_user_id` → User ID for soft delete operations 🆕
- `deleted_user_id` → ID of deleted user for restore/permanent delete 🆕
- `deleted_admin_id` → ID of deleted admin for restore/permanent delete 🆕
- `deleted_user_page` → Page number for deleted users pagination 🆕
- `deleted_user_per_page` → Items per page for deleted users 🆕
- `deleted_admin_page` → Page number for deleted admins pagination 🆕
- `deleted_admin_per_page` → Items per page for deleted admins 🆕

## 📋 Testing Order:
1. **Admin Authentication** → Login to get admin token
2. **Dashboard Overview** → View system statistics
3. **Admin Management** → CRUD operations on admin accounts
4. **Approval Threshold Management** → Configure approval rules 🆕
5. **Configuration Management** → Manage system settings and content
6. **Transaction Monitoring** → View and manage transactions
7. **Checker-Maker Operations** → Test dual approval workflow 🆕
8. **Admin User Balance Management** → Top-up user balances
9. **Transaction Reversal** → Reverse transactions if needed
10. **Audit Review** → Monitor system activities and security
11. **Admin Logout** → Clean session termination
